statements: UPDATE peak_season_data SET trend = 'High demand' WHERE season_id = 1;

UPDATE peak_season_data SET customer_age = 35, trend = 'High demand' WHERE season_id = 1;
UPDATE peak_season_data SET customer_gender = 'F' WHERE season_name = 'Summer' AND customer_age > 40;
UPDATE peak_season_data SET start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-08-31' WHERE season_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 35, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
